inclusion.criterion: Adult patients with a confirmed HCV infection
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is a 55-year-old man diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: His medical records show previous positive HCV RNA tests and a positive enzyme immunoassay for anti-HCV-antibodies

exclusion.criterion: Cannot receive standard Peg interferon+ ribavirin treatment for any reason
exclusion.label: unknown
